content: rnds the first st on the front dpn as if to purl then through the first st work rnds 1-7 of slip-stitch band on the back dpn as if to knit with mc knit 9 rnds * insert the yarn needle through the first front st as if to knit and slide it off the dpn then through the second front st as if to purl shape top and leave it on insert the yarn needle through the first back st as set-up round * k10 pm repeat from * to end of round if to purl and slide it off then through the second back st as if to round 1 * knit to 2 sts before marker k2tog repeat from * to end of knit and leave it on repeat from * until all sts have been grafted round 8 sts decrease round 2 knit repeat rnds 1-2 eight more times 8 sts rem break yarn leaving a long tail thread tail on yarn needle and draw through rem sts pull tightly to close top and fasten securely first winter by elizabeth sullivan ~ 1 ~ www sweetpaprikadesigns com
